name: newTexture(name:scaleFactor:bundle:options:completionHandler:)
desc: Asynchronously loads image data and creates a Metal texture from the named texture asset in an asset catalog.
declaration:
func newTexture(name: String, 
    scaleFactor: CGFloat, 
         bundle: Bundle?, 
        options: [MTKTextureLoader.Option : Any]? = nil, 
completionHandler: @escaping MTKTextureLoader.Callback)
